newsitem.title: USA: KCS Energy files for 3.0 mln common shares.
newsitem.headline: KCS Energy files for 3.0 mln common shares.

text.p: KCS Energy Inc filed on Tuesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission for an offering of up to 3.0 million common shares.
Of the total, 2.4 million shares will be offered in the U.S. and Canada and 600,000 shares in other countries, the Edison, N.J.,-based company said.

The offering will be made through Salomon Bros Inc, Dillon Read & Co Inc, Prudential Securities Inc, Morgan Keegan & Co Inc and Southcoast Capital Corp. The underwriters have an over-allotment option for up to 450,000 additional shares.

The company said it will use net proceeds to reduce its debt under bank credit facilities, including a revolving credit agreement to be entered into in connection with its acquisition of InterCoast Oil and Gas Co, GED Energy Services Inc and InterCoast Gas Services Co for about $221 million.
InterCoast Oil was formerly known as Medallion Production Company. The companies being acquired are units of MidAmerican Energy Co..
